TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed HitTestFilterCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function HitTestFilterCallback(potentialHitTestTarget As DependencyObject) As HitTestFilterBehavior
type HitTestFilterCallback = delegate of DependencyObject -> HitTestFilterBehavior

param.name: potentialHitTestTarget
param.span: 要执行命中测试的视觉对象。

summary.span: 表示一个回调方法，该方法指定可视化树中不进行命中测试处理的部分

span.span: Represents the callback method that specifies parts of the visual tree to omit from hit test processing

returns.span: 一个 ，它表示从命中测试中产生的操作。

span.span: A that represents the action resulting from the hit test.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 命中的测试筛选器回叫方法调用将映射到从指定的视觉对象开始，并延伸到它的可视化树的分支的命中的测试条件的所有可视化对象中。The hit test filter callback method is invoked for all the visual objects that map to the hit test criteria, starting from the visual you specify and descending through its branch of the visual tree. 但是，你可能要忽略不希望在命中测试结果回调叫函数中处理的可视化树的某些分支。However, you may want to ignore certain branches of the visual tree that you are not interested in processing in your hit test results callback function. 命中测试筛选器回叫函数的返回值确定视觉对象的枚举应采用的操作类型。The return value of the hit test filter callback function determines what type of action the enumeration of the visual objects should take. 例如，如果返回值， ，可以从命中的测试结果枚举中删除当前的视觉对象及其子代。For example, if you return the value, , you can remove the current visual object and its descendants from the hit test results enumeration. 这意味着，命中的测试结果回叫方法将看不到其枚举中的这些对象。This means that the hit test results callback method will not see these objects in its enumeration. > [!NOTE] > 修剪对象的可视化树会减少命中测试结果枚举传递期间的处理量。Pruning the visual tree of objects decreases the amount of processing during the hit test results enumeration pass. ![修剪可视化树使用命中的测试筛选器](~/add/media/filteredvisualtree-01.png "修剪可视化树使用命中的测试筛选器")![Pruning a visual tree using a hit test filter](~/add/media/filteredvisualtree-01.png "Pruning a visual tree using a hit test filter") 修剪可视化树Pruning a visual tree ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何调用通过使用值。The following example shows how to invoke by using a value. 此外定义相应的命中的测试回叫方法。The corresponding hit test callback method is also defined. [!code-csharp[HitTestingOverview#104](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HitTestingOverview/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#104)] [!code-vb[HitTestingOverview#104](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HitTestingOverview/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#104)] 下面的示例演示如何返回从命中的测试筛选器回叫方法的值。The following example shows how to return a value from a hit test filter callback method. [!code-csharp[HitTestingOverview#106](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HitTestingOverview/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#106)] [!code-vb[HitTestingOverview#106](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HitTestingOverview/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#106)]
